subject: Re: [junit] What the limitation of JUNIT APIs
msgSnippet: ... 1. JUnit tests are not scripts . 2. Yes, they play an important role: we encourage programmers to test their production code only through public methods,
messageBody:
Mohammed Ashfaq wrote:

> Hi All,
> Do the modifiers (like Public. Private etc) play an important Role in
> writing a JUnit Test Script?

1. JUnit tests are not "scripts".
2. Yes, they play an important role: we encourage programmers to test
their production code only through public methods, even though some
people /need/ to test private code.

Do you have a more specific question to ask? That would help me give you
a better answer.

> Expecting an early Reply.

Yes, we know. Everyone expects immediate answers.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services

Let's write software that people understand
